subject: Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The team will formally adopt its new ballpark in an exhibition game against the Red Sox on Friday, but a matchup between St. John’s and Georgetown served as a dress rehearsal.
snippet: The team will formally adopt its new ballpark in an exhibition game against the Red Sox on Friday, but a matchup between St. John’s and Georgetown served as a dress rehearsal.
